Reviews.Title: “The best part of this hotel was the location.”
Reviews.Author: Cheryle D
Reviews.Content: 15 minute walk victoria station bb run 3 limited english skills guests allowed toaster didnt host wash hands prepared recommend en suite staying couple days beds uncomfortable shared bathroom dirty stayed 7 nights 3 nights bigger using shared bathroom remaining 4 nights en suite beds uncomfortable morning awakened 6am fire alarm guests smoking stand outside dark owners checked

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: RonKel21
Reviews.Content: family booked overnight stay london based positive reviews disappointed yes price sleep touring city day perfect staff wonderful help sightseeing questions booked tickets patience tourist questions breakfast expect price people expect star hotel sitting inside outside breakfast sitting hesitate stay overnight visit

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff but tiny room.”
Reviews.Author: DannyDogg07
Reviews.Content: staff friendly keen help advice whenever location tiny fit beds suitcases bathroom clean water hot morning bit pain start stairs throughout hotel steep narrow trundling luggage breakfast dining couldnt fit guests couldnt breakfast internet overall nice stay friendly staff location cleanliness aware tiny cramped

Reviews.Title: “1st stay-great, 2nd visit-disappointed”
Reviews.Author: jambug
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2007 perfect price clean friendly staff incredible location near victoria station major attractions stayed completely changed unclean insects showers disappointed filled beds bathrooms shared level breakfast consisted cereals toast juice coffee

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, nice helpful staff, cheap price and very close to Victoria, recommend it...”
Reviews.Author: Danijel22
Reviews.Content: weve london 2 dayswe payed night bus victoria airport flight leaving clean beds comfortable ensuite triple bathroom youre bathroom smallbut nice guy nice helpful cheap night waiting kept luggage day checkout instead paying station luggage stores recommend hotel youre looking cheap clean safe near victoria hotel
